My last projects

Autonomus grave care

Desktop App, Python, AI, Machine learning

In 4 person team I was responsible of algorithm Astar and Candidate Elimination Algorithm. First one find the best route to the grave (takes into account rotation) and second one learning decision tree which is responsible for take good decision.

Online bookstore

WebApp, JavaScript, React, Java, Spring

In 2 person team I was responsible of frontend side and little bit of backend. Application connect with remote database with books and show them to user. User can search them by few parameters (author, name ,etc.).

Search users

WebApp, React, Redux

I made simple app to learn React and Redux basics. We can search users, by their name. Users are taken by fetch method from (https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/)

Search users

WebApp, Html, Css, JavaScript

Simple app to learn basics of JavaScript. App made by div's which made sound after clicking on them. That clicks trigger animation of ball.

Search users

Desktop App, Java, Fuzzy library

Application to grasp better understanding of fuzzy logic. Velocity of first car is random between 0 up to 120. Second car try to follow the first one, but not want to overtake him.
